equip_suit.name: Phaethon's Melody
equip_suit.desc2: When any squad member uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the equipper's Anomaly Proficiency increases by 45 for 8s. If the character using the <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> is not the equipper, the equipper's <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> is increased by 25%.

equip_suit.name: Moonlight Lullaby
equip_suit.desc2: When the equipper is a Support character and uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the DMG dealt by all squad members increases by 18% for 25s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

equip_suit.name: Moonlight Lullaby
equip_suit.desc2: When the equipper is a Support character and uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the DMG dealt by all squad members increases by 18% for 25s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

equip_suit.name: Moonlight Lullaby
equip_suit.desc2: When the equipper is a Support character and uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the DMG dealt by all squad members increases by 18% for 25s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

equip_suit.name: Moonlight Lullaby
equip_suit.desc2: When the equipper is a Support character and uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the DMG dealt by all squad members increases by 18% for 25s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

equip_suit.name: Phaethon's Melody
equip_suit.desc2: When any squad member uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the equipper's Anomaly Proficiency increases by 45 for 8s. If the character using the <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> is not the equipper, the equipper's <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> is increased by 25%.

weapon.name: Metanukimorphosis
weapon.talent_content: When the equipper's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, their <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly Mastery</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>30</color> for 40s. When the equipper's <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> hits an enemy, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly Proficiency</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>60</color> for 40s. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.

items.title: Basic Attack: Tanuki Claws
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:\nUnleashes up to 5 strikes ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

items.title: Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak
items.text:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Enter a defensive stance for up to 1.5 seconds. If hit during this time, parry the attack and inflict massive Daze against the attacking enemy.
Successfully parrying an attack gains 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
Character is invulnerable when successfully parrying.

items.title: Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot
items.text:
When Yuzuha has <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>, landing a hit with other active characters' attacks will have Yuzuha continuously twirl her umbrella and attack centered around the target before launching a powerful shell, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. When this attack lands a heavy attack, Yuzuha consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Point</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot</color> is considered an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot</color> can be triggered once every 8s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles
items.text:
Enemies under the effect of <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> will be attacked by a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> once every 1s.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> initially deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> does not contribute its accumulated Attribute Anomaly Buildup toward Anomaly DMG calculation.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color>.

items.title: Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max
items.text:
Enemies affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> will be attacked by a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> when hit with a heavy attack from <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> initially deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> does not contribute its accumulated Attribute Anomaly Buildup toward Anomaly DMG calculation.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color>.

items.title: Basic Attack: Tanuki Helper
items.text: When Yuzuha is off-field, tanuki Kama assists the active character in attacking enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.\nWhen Yuzuha performs <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak</color>, tanuki Kama joins her in attacking the enemy, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.\nTanuki Kama inherits Yuzuha's initial ATK.

items.title: Special Attack: Gummy Bombardment
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:\nFire a cannon shot forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

items.title: EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert
items.text:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Throw a bomb at the enemy, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Upon hitting an enemy with a heavy attack, it inflicts the <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state.
Gains 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color> upon activation.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert, Right Now!
items.text:
After using <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter: Time for Payback~</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist: Dessert Time</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: We Have Cookies</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color>, or when a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Quickly throw a bomb at the enemy, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
On hitting an enemy with a heavy attack, it inflicts the <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state.
Gains 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color> upon activation.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Sweet Scare
items.text: The <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state lasts for <color=#2BAD00>40</color>s, repeated triggers reset the duration.\nWhen an enemy affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> is first hit by an active character using an attack of their attribute, <color=#FFFFFF>Flavor Match</color> is triggered against that enemy, changing the attribute of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> against that enemy to match that of the character who triggered Flavor Match.\nWhen <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> is triggered again on an enemy, their existing <color=#FFFFFF>Flavor Match</color> state is removed. The process can be repeated to change the attribute of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> again.

items.title: Dodge: Did I Scare You?
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:\nA quick dash dodge.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Dash Attack: You're Outta Luck!
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:\nRapidly strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

items.title: Dodge Counter: Time for Payback~
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:\nDeliver a quick strike forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Chain Attack: Prank Assault
items.text:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleash a powerful strike on enemies in a small area ahead, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Gains 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color> when used.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Ultimate: Surrender or Suffer the Mischief
items.text:
When Decibel Rating reaches Maximum, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to trigger:
Unleash a powerful strike on enemies in a large area around the character, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Enemies hit with a heavy attack are inflicted with the <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state.
Upon activating this skill, other squad members gain <color=#2BAD00>25</color> Energy.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Core Passive: Whimsical Wonder
items.text:
Upon entering the battlefield, Yuzuha immediately gains 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
Yuzuha can have up to 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
When Yuzuha's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert, Right Now!</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Surrender or Suffer the Mischief</color> hits an enemy, all squad members receive the <color=#FFFFFF>Tanuki Wish</color> effect.
<color=#FFFFFF>Tanuki Wish</color> grants an ATK increase equal to 40% of Yuzuha's initial ATK, up to a maximum increase of <color=#2BAD00>1200</color>, and increases the DMG dealt by those with the effect by 15%, lasting 40s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
If Yuzuha's initial ATK reaches 3000, she grants the full ATK bonus to all squad members.

items.title: Additional Ability: The More the Merrier
items.text: When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:\nIf Yuzuha's Anomaly Mastery exceeds 100, every point over increases the Anomaly Buildup Rate of characters with <color=#FFFFFF>Tanuki Wish</color> by <color=#2BAD00>0.2%</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>, and all Attribute Anomaly DMG and <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> DMG by <color=#2BAD00>0.2%</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>. When Yuzuha's Anomaly Mastery is at 200, she grants the full buff effect.

items.title: Quick Assist: Dessert Time
items.text: When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:\nStrike enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Defensive Assist: Replenish Your Fun
items.text:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Upon a successful parry, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Assist Follow-Up: We Have Cookies
items.text: After triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or successfully parrying an enemy attack with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:\nStrike enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot
items.text: After triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or successfully parrying an enemy attack with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> at the right moment to activate:\nFollowing a continuous spinning umbrella attack, fire a powerful projectile that deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

ranks.name: Lucky Constitution
ranks.desc: Yuzuha regains 30 Energy when she enters the battlefield. In Investigation Zone Mode, this effect can trigger at most once every 180s.\nEnemies in the <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state have their All-Attribute RES reduced by 10%. The Attribute Anomaly DMG and <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> DMG buff from her <color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color> is increased to 130% of its original value.

ranks.name: Full of Colorful Company
ranks.desc: When Yuzuha's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert, Right Now!</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Surrender or Suffer the Mischief</color> hits an enemy, all squad members' DMG increases by 15% and Anomaly Buildup Rate by 15%, lasting 40s and repeated triggers reset the duration. When a heavy attack hits an enemy that is not Stunned, it will trigger a forced <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> triggered this way have reduced Interrupt Level and forced <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> can only occur once every 20s.\nWhenever another character enters through a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, Yuzuha gains 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.\nYuzuha's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot</color> cooldown is reduced by 25%.

ranks.name: Falling Magic
ranks.desc: The DMG of Yuzuha's <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: We Have Cookies</color> increases by 30%, Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20%, and triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> when it hits an enemy.

ranks.name: Put Down Roots
ranks.desc: Gain 1 additional <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color> when successfully parrying an enemy attack using a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak</color>. When using <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to charge for up to 0.8 seconds. Releasing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or reaching full charge fires an extra powerful shell at the enemy. For every 0.4s charged, Yuzuha consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Point</color> to fire an additional powerful shell, each dealing 300% of her ATK as <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.\nIf any powerful shell from <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color> hits an enemy, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> DMG Multiplier increases by 105% for 40s, and stacking up to 3 times, with each stack duration being calculated separately. In addition, if the powerful shell hits an enemy under <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color>, it'll trigger 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> attack.\nIf Yuzuha is attacked while charging, she will automatically dodge the attack and immediately unleash the max-charged attack.
